title: Is NIOS valid for IPU university? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes it is! NIOS ( The National Institute of Open Schooling) is the board of education under the Union Govt. of India and it’s result is valid to take admission almost in every university in India. Though for eligibility criteria one should visit the official website of the university and check other requirement for the admission. Good luck!

Hi,Plzzz remember every institute or university has its own eligibility criteria for admissions.According to me it is always advisable to visit university website for exact information about eligibility criteria. Hope this helps you buddy.
